text: The 2014–15 Samoa Men's Premier League will be the 25th season of top-flight football in Samoa. The season start on November 1, 2014. The winner will qualify for the 2016–17 OFC Champions League == Teams == *Adidas Soccer Club *BSL Vaitele Uta *Central United *Kiwi *Leauvaa *Lupe ole Soaga (Magiagi) *Moaula United *One Way Wind *Vaimoso *Vaipuna *Vaitoloa *Vaivase-tai ==Standings== Category:Football (soccer) in Samoa
title: 2014–15 Samoa Men's Premier League
